title: Blended Education Program for Enhancing ESP Speaking Skills for Nursing Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Fundamental Understanding of Nursing Tasks
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen job-centered English speaking skills immediately applicable in medical settings. Combining digital tools with face-to-face coaching to create a self-directed learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can communicate using accurate medical terminology at least 80% of the time in role-playing scenarios based on nursing tasks.
Learners can improve self-regulated learning strategies by writing self-assessment journals incorporating expert feedback at least twice a week.
Learners complete at least 90% of speaking practice for patient interaction scenarios in hospitals via a digital learning platform, enhancing real-world applicability.

resources: ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Specialist Instructor Pool

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
